snippet: The defense team for a teenager charged with killing three students and wounding three others in a high school cafeteria in Chardon asked a judge to move the trial out of the community.
abstract: Defense team for T J Lane, a teenager charged with killing three students and wounding three others in a high school cafeteria in Chardon, Ohio, asks a judge to move the trial out of the community.
lead_paragraph: The defense team for a teenager charged with killing three students and wounding three others in a high school cafeteria in Chardon asked a judge to move the trial out of the community.

headline.main: Ohio: Change of Venue Sought in Trial Over Cafeteria Killings
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Change of Venue Sought In Trial Over Cafeteria Killings
